content.raw:
Resolving conflicts in this migration is a bit like playing whack-a-mole. Since this PR is trying to move files to new directories, conflicts are going to keep occurring until the branch is merged.

I think the most sane way to handle this migration will be to throw away this branch and do one very quick PR that just moves a bunch of files and fixes the visibility macros of components. We would need to get that PR approved and merged quickly to avoid racking up any further conflicts.
content.html:
Resolving conflicts in this migration is a bit like playing whack-a-mole. Since this PR is trying to move files to new directories, conflicts are going to keep occurring until the branch is merged.

I think the most sane way to handle this migration will be to throw away this branch and do one very quick PR that just moves a bunch of files and fixes the visibility macros of components. We would need to get that PR approved and merged quickly to avoid racking up any further conflicts.
